statements: SELECT player_name, total_playtime, achievements_completed, player_id FROM game_progress;
SELECT * FROM game_progress WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name FROM game_progress ORDER BY total_playtime DESC;
SELECT player_name, total_playtime FROM game_progress WHERE achievements_completed > 10;
SELECT player_id, player_name, total_playtime FROM game_progress WHERE achievements_completed < 5 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, achievements_completed, total_playtime FROM game_progress WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, achievements_completed FROM game_progress WHERE total_playtime > '10 hours' ORDER BY achievements_completed DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_progress WHERE achievements_completed = (SELECT MAX(achievements_completed) FROM game_progress);
SELECT player_id, player_name, achievements_completed, total_playtime FROM game_progress ORDER BY total_playtime DESC, player_name ASC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, total_playtime FROM game_progress WHERE achievements_completed < 5 AND total_playtime > '1 hour';
SELECT * FROM achievements;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_date FROM achievements WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM achievements ORDER BY achievement_date DESC;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_description FROM achievements WHERE achievement_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, total_progress, level FROM player_progress ORDER BY total_progress DESC, level ASC;
SELECT achievement_id, achievement_name FROM achievements WHERE achievement_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM achievements WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY achievement_date DESC;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_description FROM achievements WHERE achievement_name ILIKE '%gold%' AND achievement_description ILIKE '%earned%';
SELECT player_id, MAX(total_progress) AS highest_progress FROM player_progress GROUP BY player_id HAVING MAX(total_progress) > 100;
SELECT player_id, SUM(total_progress) AS total_progress FROM player_progress WHERE level > 5 GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_progress DESC;
SELECT * FROM achievements
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_date FROM achievements WHERE player_id = 123
SELECT player_id, level FROM player_progress ORDER BY level DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM player_recognition WHERE recognition_type = 'MVP'
SELECT * FROM player_recognition WHERE recognition_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM achievements WHERE player_id = 101 ORDER BY achievement_date DESC;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_date FROM achievements WHERE achievement_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_achievements FROM achievements GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM achievements INNER JOIN player_progress ON achievements.player_id = player_progress.player_id;
SELECT player_id, MAX(experience) AS highest_experience FROM player_progress GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY highest_experience DESC;
SELECT * FROM achievements;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name FROM achievements WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, level, experience FROM player_progress ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT player_id, recognition_title FROM player_recognition WHERE date_recognized > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, player_name, registration_date FROM player_info ORDER BY registration_date;
SELECT * FROM achievements WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT achievement_name, date_achieved FROM achievements WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT player_name, registration_date FROM player_info WHERE player_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM player_progress WHERE level > 5 ORDER BY experience DESC;
SELECT recognition_title, date_recognized FROM player_recognition WHERE player_id = 4 AND date_recognized <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM achievements ORDER BY achievement_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_description FROM achievements WHERE achievement_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE player_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM progress WHERE progress_percentage < 50 ORDER BY progress_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM achievements ORDER BY achievement_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_name, player_email, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT p.player_name, a.achievement_name, r.reward_name FROM players p JOIN achievements a ON p.player_id = a.player_id JOIN rewards r ON p.player_id = r.player_id;
SELECT player_name, player_email, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level BETWEEN 5 AND 10;

SELECT player_name, achievement_name, progress_percentage FROM players p JOIN progress pr ON p.player_id = pr.player_id JOIN achievements a ON a.achievement_id = pr.achievement_id ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC LIMIT 5;
